ref.mixed-citation: Forster T . Illustrations of the Atmospherical Origin of Epidemic Diseases, and of Its Relation to Their Predisponent Constitutional Causes, Exemplified by Historical Notices and Cases, and on the Twofold Means of Prevention, Mitigation, and Cure, and of the Powerful Influence of Change of Air, as a Principal Remedy. To which are Appended, Popular Rules for the Maintenance of Health, 2nd edn Chelmsford: Meggy & Chalk, 1829.
